metadata.title: CVE-2024-36946 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phonet: fix rtm_phonet_notify() skb allocationfill_route() stores three components in the skb:- struct rtmsg- RTA_DST (u8)- RTA_OIF (u32)Therefore, rtm_phonet_notify() should useNLMSG_ALIGN(sizeof(struct rtmsg)) +nla_total_size(1) +nla_total_size(4)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
